The Cell passed in the command is not a valid Cell.
INVALID_COLOR - it.polimi.ingsw.model.ErrorType
The PrintableColor passed in the command was already taken by another Player in the same match, or it's an invalid PrintableColor.
INVALID_GOD - it.polimi.ingsw.model.ErrorType
The god passed in the command was already taken by another Player in the same match, or it's an invalid god.

InvalidColorException - Exception in it.polimi.ingsw.exceptions
This exception is raised when a Player tries to select a PrintableColor which is not valid, because its String representation is not recognized, or because that PrintableColor has already been chosen.
InvalidColorException() - Constructor for exception it.polimi.ingsw.exceptions.InvalidColorException
 
InvalidGodException - Exception in it.polimi.ingsw.exceptions
This exception is raised when a Player tries to select a GodStrategy which is not valid or because that GodStrategy has already been chosen, or it's not selectable for this match.
InvalidGodException() - Constructor for exception it.polimi.ingsw.exceptions.InvalidGodException
